column1: Kata Robata////* Ambiance: Kata Robata is perfect for a date night -- it's low-lit and intimate
column3: so small group gatherings would still fit right in. Aside from booths and small tables
column4: there's also a sushi bar and heated outdoor patio. There's also this ONE particular booth in the middle of the restaurant that kind of sits on its own
column5: has its own liting and decor
column6: and it practically screams "special occasion"... I wonder what that's all about.
